results.title: Music: the language of us all
results.brief_description: A unique perspective on the Eureka Stockade story created by a Eureka 150 youth ambassador in a special Digital Storytelling Workshop to celebrate 150 years since the famous rebellion. Dominique’s story is about the use of music as the most honest and universal form of free expression.
results.description: A unique perspective on the Eureka Stockade story created by a Eureka 150 youth ambassador in a special Digital Storytelling Workshop to celebrate 150 years since the famous rebellion. results.title: The Importance of Equality
results.brief_description: A unique perspective on the Eureka Stockade story created by a Eureka 150 youth ambassador in a special Digital Storytelling Workshop to celebrate 150 years since the famous rebellion. This story made by Nosrat from Coburg shows how the principles fought for in the Eureka rebellion have resonance around the world today.

group_works.title: Step family
group_works.creator_credit: Ronald Floethe, Centron and Gordon-Kerckhoff Productions

results.title: Divorce
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Family Life Transitions in Marriage”.
Examines the impact of divorce on both children and adults. Uses the case study of a fictional family to show the problems, adjustments, and critical issues involved when couples decide to get a divorce.
results.description:

results.title: The Goldrush had started
results.brief_description: A unique perspective on the Eureka Stockade story created by a Eureka 150 youth ambassador in a special Digital Storytelling Workshop to celebrate 150 years since the famous rebellion. Ben from Alfredton tells the story of his great, great, great, great grandfather who travelled to Australia in search of gold in 1851.

results.title: Step family
results.creator_credit: Ronald Floethe, Centron and Gordon-Kerckhoff Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Family Life Transitions in Marriage”.
The third in a series of transitions in family life, this episode looks at the adjustments necessary to integrating new family members and the effect that this has on the separated parent.

results.title: The Single parent family
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Family Life Transitions in Marriage”.
Examines the adjustments that children and parents must make after a divorce. Follows the case of a fictional couple whose divorce results in the woman having to face the problems and issues of single parenthood.

results.title: Footprints of Eureka: Then and Now
results.brief_description: A unique perspective on the Eureka Stockade story created by a Eureka 150 youth ambassador in a special Digital Storytelling Workshop to celebrate 150 years since the famous rebellion. Stephanie from Terang is the 19 year-old founder of Youth Freedom International “What a sight that would have been to see young people down on one knee swearing allegiance to an idea”.

results.title: The Eureka Story
results.brief_description: A unique perspective on the Eureka Stockade story created by a Eureka 150 youth ambassador in a special Digital Storytelling Workshop to celebrate 150 years since the famous rebellion. Tom, a year 9 student from Ballarat, completed this story about the causes for the battle “…because it is the most interesting part”.

results.title: A discovery of freedom
results.brief_description: A unique perspective on the Eureka Stockade story created by a Eureka 150 youth ambassador in a special Digital Storytelling Workshop to celebrate 150 years since the famous rebellion. This story is a document of 17 year-old Tom’s experiences in the Eureka 150 youth team. “..I realised that my freedoms and rights were things I had taken for granted”.
